title: Mars Transit in the 12th House for Capricorn Ascendant
summary: When Mars transits the 12th house for Capricorn Ascendant, energy turns inward, focusing on isolation, rest, expenses, and hidden efforts. You may feel driven to work behind the scenes, confront subconscious anger, or withdraw to regain strength. Expenses can rise due to impulsive actions or health-related needs. This phase supports disciplined solitude, research, and spiritual or strategic preparation. Balance comes by controlling impulsiveness and channeling Marsâ€™ force into quiet planning, allowing recovery and renewal before the next outward push.

sections.title: Finance
points: Costs related to health or travel

closing: This Mars transit asks Capricorn Ascendants to slow down and reset. Quiet discipline turns inner tension into renewed strength.
